hero.title: Transform Your
hero.description: Expert automotive paint services with precision craftsmanship. We bring your vision to life with cutting-edge techniques and premium materials that last.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Professional automotive paint services tailored to your needs

customPaint.title: Custom Paint Jobs
customPaint.description: From classic colors to custom designs, we create stunning finishes that match your vision perfectly.

paintProtection.title: Paint Protection
paintProtection.description: Advanced ceramic coatings and protective films to keep your paint looking showroom fresh for years.

paintCorrection.title: Paint Correction
paintCorrection.description: Remove scratches, swirls, and imperfections with our multi-stage paint correction process.

quickTouchups.title: Quick Touch-ups
quickTouchups.description: Fast and professional repairs for minor scratches, chips, and paint damage. In and out in hours.

location.title: Visit Our Shop
location.description: Come see us for a free consultation and quote

footer.description: Professional automotive paint services with over 15 years of experience. We're passionate about making your car look perfect.
